name: A280 Sharpshooter Rifle (V)
Lore: 'BlasTech sharpshooter rifle accurate to 500 meters. Corporal Janse brought several A280s with him when he left BlasTech.',
Text: 'Deploy on your Rebel scout. During battles at same site, attrition against opponent is +1. May target a character, creature or vehicle at same or adjacent site for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value. Once during your control phase, may fire using 2 Force.',
